text: Bartholomeus Jan "Bart" Bok (April 28, 1906 â€“ August 5, 1983) was a Dutch- American astronomer, teacher, and lecturer. He is best known for his work on the Milky Way galaxy, and for the discovery of Bok globules. ==References== Category:1906 births Category:1983 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Dutch astronomers Category:American astronomers Category:Scientists from Tucson, Arizona Category:Educators from Tucson, Arizona
title: Bart Bok
